title: Saudi Arabia's PIF cuts stake in Nintendo after report said it was considering increase
content: The PIF reduced its stakehold in the Japanese video game giant to 7.54% from 8.58% previously, according to a Japanese regulatory filing.
summary: The PIF reduced its stakehold in the Japanese video game giant to 7.54% from 8.58% previously, according to a Japanese regulatory filing.

title: Why oil and gas markets are dreading the risk of supply disruption in the Strait of Hormuz
content: An escalating conflict in the Middle East has thrust the world's most important oil artery back into the global spotlight.

title: S&P's Dan Yergin warns of 'dangerous time' for global economy as Middle East tensions fester
content: The global economy is staring at a "dangerous time" like never before as Middle East tensions remain elevated, said S&P Global's vice chairman Daniel Yergin.
summary: The global economy is staring at a "dangerous time" like never before as Middle East tensions remain elevated, said S&P Global's vice chairman Daniel Yergin.

title: China to impose anti-dumping measures on EU brandy
content: The move came days after the European Union pressed ahead in adopting definitive tariffs of up to 45% on China-made battery electric vehicles last Friday.

title: China's growth is set to slow next year despite temporary boost from stimulus, World Bank warns

title: This 42-year-old built a $2 billion a year super app called Grab: I worked '20 hour' days

title: Apple could launch a ring to rival Samsung by 2026, research firm predicts

title: Chinese travelers trickle back to a Taiwanese island, mere miles from the mainland
content: Tourism has slowly started to resume on Kinmen, a remote Taiwanese island 1.8 miles from China that once thrived on visitors from the mainland.

content: Google will be restricted from paying fees or sharing revenue with companies in exchange for them choosing to not compete with Google's app store.
